original_text: And Naaman said, “Be pleased to accept two talents.” And he urged him and tied up two talents of silver in two bags, with two changes of clothing, and laid them on two of his servants. And they carried them before Gehazi.
korean_text: 나아만이 이르되 바라건대 두 달란트를 받으라 하고 그를 강권하여 은 두 달란트를 두 전대에 넣어 매고 옷 두 벌을 아울러 두 사환에게 지우매 그들이 게하시 앞에서 지고 가니라

sentences.original_text: and tied up two talents of silver in two bags,
sentences.korean_translation: 은 두 달란트를 두 자루에 넣어 묶고

sentences.original_text: and laid them on two of his servants.
And they carried them before Gehazi.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것을 가지고 게하시 앞으로 가니라
